definition: a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government, either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence, to make or emit a high sound, typical of glass
details:
noun
- a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government, either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence
= example: a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government, either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence
= synonyms: pokey
- a short light metallic sound
= example: a short light metallic sound
= synonyms: click
verb
- to make or emit a high sound, typical of glass
= example: to make or emit a high sound, typical of glass
